name: Newman–Shanks–Williams prime
summary:
In mathematics, a Newman–Shanks–Williams prime (NSW prime) is a prime number p which can be written in the form

  
    
      
        
          S
          
            2
            m
            +
            1
          
        
        =
        
          
            
              
                
                  (
                  
                    1
                    +
                    
                      
                        2
